comments.raw_text: On opening a new window, about:home is loaded and the search box given focus instead of the URL bar. Some people don't realize this, and type in a URL to load - which then performs a search for that URL. For those that do realize that focus is in the search box, it's an unnecessary additional shortcut/click to focus the URL bar to enter a URL. about:home should detect valid URLs and load them directly.
comments.author: blair@theunfocused.net
